summary: The happy tranquility of Buggsville is shattered when the populace learns that a colossal skyscraper is to be built over their tiny town.
cast: Kenny Gardner|Jack Mercer|Tedd Pierce|Carl Meyer|Stan Freed|Pauline Loth|The Four Marshals|The Royal Guards|Pinto Colvig|Margie Hines|Mae Questel|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams
